metadata.title: CVE-2020-35525 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description:
In SQlite 3.31.1, a potential null pointer derreference was found in the INTERSEC query processing.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-35525` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

lemon - 3.39.2-1
libsqlite3-0 - 3.39.2-1
libsqlite3-tcl - 3.39.2-1
sqlite3 - 3.39.2-1
sqlite3-tools - 3.39.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: sqlite package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
sqlite3 package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.39.2-1').
